name: First and Last Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played the First Lady in the 1980 movie "First Family"?
questions.explanation:
Madeline Kahn.

	Bob Newhart starred as President Manfred Link in this comedy directed by Buck Henry.

questions.text: Who had the title role in "The Last Temptation of Christ"?
questions.explanation:
Willem Dafoe.

	This controversial 1988 movie was adapted from the 1955 novel by Nikos Kazantzakis.  The movie co-starred Harvey Keitel, Barbara Hershey and David Bowie and was directed by Martin Scorcese.

questions.text: Who starred opposite Bruce Willis in "The Last Boy Scout"?
questions.explanation:
Damon Wayans.

	This 1991 action/drama was directed by Tony Scott.

questions.text: Christian Slater and Gary Sinise starred in "Murder in the First".
questions.explanation:
False.

	This 1995 drama starred Christian Slater, Kevin Bacon and Gary Oldman.

questions.text: What subject did "First Monday in October" deal with?
questions.correct: First woman appointed to the Supreme Court
questions.explanation:
First woman appointed to the Supreme Court.

	This 1981 comedy starred Jill Clayburgh as Ruth Loomis, the first woman appointed to the U.S. Supreme Court.  Walter Matthau also starred.

questions.text: What was Hawkeye's 'real' name in the 1992 movie "The Last of the Mohicans"?
questions.explanation:
Nathaniel Poe.

	Daniel Day-Lewis starred as Nathaniel Poe/Hawkeye in this adaption of James Fenimore Cooper's novel of the same name.

questions.text: "The First Wives Club" was about U.S. Presidents' wives.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Diane Keaton, Goldie Hawn and Bette Midler starred in this 1996 comedy about ex-wives seeking revenge on their former husbands.

questions.text: Who played Barney Cashman in "The Last of the Red Hot Lovers"?
questions.explanation:
Alan Arkin.

	Alan Arkin starred in this 1972 comedy along with Sally Kellerman, Paula Prentiss and Renee Taylor.

questions.text: Who played opposite Val Kilmer in "At First Sight"?
questions.explanation:
Mira Sorvino.

	Mira Sorvino plays Amy, who falls in love with Virgil (Val Kilmer), who is blind but regains his sight.

questions.text: Wes Craven directed the 1972 movie "Last House on the Left".
questions.explanation:
True.

	This was the first feature film for director Wes Craven, who would go on to direct other horror movies, such as "Nightmare on Elm Street", "Scream" and many, many more frightening movies.
